remarks: Version of ~ 19.3 with a dv condition, requiring fewer axioms.  Any formula can be universally quantified using a variable which it does not contain.  See also ~ 19.9v .  (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)  Remove dependency on ~ ax-7 .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2017.)
statement:
19.3v $p |- ( A. x ph <-> ph ) $.
$d ph x $.
